ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

F_BAN_LOGGER_GROUP.description: Put Group id Same As PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.

ALIVE_NAME.description: Fill your Full name or Username like @TeamDaisyX.

ALIVE_PHOTTO.description: put here any telegraph media link use .awake to show.

PMPERMIT_PIC.description: put here any telegraph media link for pmpermit custom pic.

PM_PERMIT_GROUP_ID.description: Put an Group Id Same As PRIVATE_GROUP_ID Required For Pmpermit plugin.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Putting Others Value may result In Account Ban.

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Putting Others Value May result In Account Ban.

PLUGIN_CHANNEL.description: skip or Create a private group add rose  then type /id. PLUGIN_CHANNEL and PRIVATE_GROUP_ID both values should be same

PRIVATE_GROUP_BOT_API_ID.description: skip or create a private channel and then type .get_id add that value here for save messages

PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.description: skip or Create a private group add rose bot then type /id. PLUGIN_CHANNEL and PRIVATE_GROUP_ID both values should be same

PM_LOGGR_BOT_API_ID.description: skip or for login private messages create a private channel and do .get_id and add that id

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

TG_BOT_TOKEN_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the token of your bot. And Don't Forget To Turn on inline Mode on bot settings. Get it.

CHROME_BIN.description: For Carbon.py. Leave as it is.

CHROME_DRIVER.description: For Carbon.py. Leave as it is.

TG_BOT_USER_NAME_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the username of your bot without @

ONLINE_ALERT.description: Set it True for being informed by the Assistant Bot that DaisyX is now working. Preferred and By-Default is True

NO_OF_BUTTONS_DISPLAYED_IN_H_ME_CMD.description: Set The Amount Of Buttons Displayed In Help Command

NO_OF_COLUMS_DISPLAYED_IN_H_ME_CMD.description: Set The Amount Of Rows You Want To Displayed In Help Command default 2

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time for autopic get from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc

PM_DATA.description: Type DISABLE if you want to disable pm protection...
